comments.author: Greg
comments.body:
Sorry to miss Dave's last ride before going under the knife. My fear is that the true nature of his "surgery" is not so much about restoring his normal function as it is about giving him super-human powers along the lines of Steve Austin. Afraid my days of edging out the old guy could be numbered.

BTW, hope you didn't [come across any bears](http://www.dailycamera.com/archivesearch/ci_13099379) on your ride up Sugarloaf.

 -Greg
